emuInput.TitMainTitle: President of Miller Street School PTA Marie Thomas, standing on sidewalk near brick and concrete wall with debris on vacant lot from demolished house on Miller Street, Hill District
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 10, 1957, page 2, reads: "Dangerous 'Cave' - Mrs. Marie Thomas, president of the Miller Street School P.T.A. looks over a retaining wall where a student fell down the slope and injured himself at its base. At left, in a cave, is a piece of protruding rusted broken and sharp pointed pipe on which a playing child could easily impale himself. - Harris Photo."
